column2: labs(title = "Denmark", subtitle=paste("Population per kommune in ", "1993", sep="")) +
geom_text(data=centers_cartogram, aes_string(x="x", y="y", label= "X1993"), color="black", size=2, alpha=1) +
plot.title = element_text(size= 22, hjust=0.5, color = "#4e4d47", margin = margin(b = -0.1, t = 0.4, l = 2, unit = "cm")),
plot.subtitle = element_text(size= 13, hjust=0.5, color = "#4e4d47", margin = margin(b = -0.1, t = 0.4, l = 2, unit = "cm")),
